text: It seems that for big projects Mercurial is way more ergonomic than Git.

elements.text: It seems that for big projects Mercurial is way more ergonomic than Git.

text: hmmm... interesting, I used to use mercurial because it was simpler than git with a less confusing interface (al least for me). On the other hand, I always thought that git was more efficient.
